description: In their limo ride back home, Max (Michael Lucas) and Nick (Jason Ridge) pick up a hot trick (Derrick Hanson), who also happened to be a model in the runway show. They get high back at Derricks Brooklyn apartment and have a sizzling three-way fuck-fest.
series: Michael Lucas' La Dolce Vita: Part 1
title: Michael Lucas, Derrick Hanson, and Jason Ridge
